name: Kenny McCoy's Peg Leg Punch
description: Brugal Extra Dry Rum meets Cocchi Americano and Gran Classico in this punch from Kenny McCoy of Ward III and The Rum House. If you're used to thinking of rum punches as sugary, tropical concoctions, this will change your mind.
recipeIngredient: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle Brugal Extra Dry Rum
2 ounces Highland Park 12 Year Old Scotch Whisky
6 ounces (3/4 cup) fresh squeezed orange juice (from about 3 oranges)
6 ounces (3/4 cup) fresh squeezed lemon juice (from about 7-8 lemons)
Champagne, to taste (you'll need less than a bottle)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all liquid ingredients in a large punch bowl and add ice. Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour. Top off with champagne; serve with a twist of orange and lemon rind in a chilled rocks glass with 1 large cube of ice.
